For guest use only z/VM (V7R1 and later) All PUs must be SHR or DED SSCb b. Secure Service Container IFLs, or CPs Linux-based appliance IFLs DED or IFLs SHR or CPs DED or CPs SHR Chapter 3. Central processor complex design 125 Dynamically adding or deleting a logical partition name Dynamically adding or deleting an LPAR name is the ability to add or delete LPARs and their associated I/O resources to or from the configuration without a POR. The extra channel subsystem and multiple image facility (MIF) image ID pairs (CSSID/MIFID) can be later assigned to an LPAR for use (or later removed). This process can be done through
